definition: presaging or likely to bring good luck
details:
adjective
- presaging or likely to bring good luck
= example: presaging or likely to bring good luck
= synonyms: golden
- occurring at a convenient or suitable time
= example: occurring at a convenient or suitable time
= synonyms: favorable
- of winds or weather, tending to promote or facilitate
= example: of winds or weather, tending to promote or facilitate
= synonyms: favorable
- encouraging or approving or pleasing
= example: encouraging or approving or pleasing
= synonyms: favorable
